item.description: Tuesday night rock at the Rosebud, we generally have 40+ different singers and a great appreciative audience. If you are looking to have a great time, showcase your talents and sing on our stage under the lights, with a professional, house sound system, the some one they use for bands that play here, come check us out. Great fun, the food is great and great drinks. Come on down and experience the Rosebud....
item.name: Tuesday Night karaoke @ The Rosebud
